pages.body:
# How to Post GIFs on 0chan Porn

* Find a .gif to upload (**image.gif**).
* Copy **image.gif** to **image.jpg**.
* Post **image.jpg** on 0chan Porn.
* Open the file **ZeroNet/data/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/data/users/**your_auth_adress**/data.json**.

> *You can find your **auth_address** on the **ZeroNet/data/users.json** file.*

* The last item on **data.json** should be **image.jpg**.
* You will see on **attachment_full_path** and **attachment_thumb_path** that your image was saved twice with different names. (like **03aa3f5e277....jpg** and **03aa3f5e277...-thumb.jpg**)
* Make note of the name of the two files and close the file
* Copy the original file, **image.gif**, over the files that you noted from **attachment_path** and **attachment_thumb_path**.
* Sign and Publish your **data/users/**your_auth_address**/content.json**.

## Issues

Sometimes it doesn't work?
